attributes.additional_details:
Bede Wing at South Tyneside General Hospital is in danger of being closed under healthcare reforms, and to lose such a vital service, which is so very important to recovery of many a mental health patient (myself included), would be a travesty and result in terrible setbacks and consequences for those who rely on this unit.

If you believe in a patients right to be treated in their own area, please sign this petition today, and share it and raise awareness of this cause.

Thankyou.
